lead_paragraph: Long lines and a cramped space can’t lessen the relentless pleasures coming from the kitchen.

headline.print_headline: Hurry Up and Wait (and Bring a Chair)
headline.main: Filipino Food Worth the Wait at Bad Saint in Washington

abstract: Pete Wells reviews Filipino restaurant Bad Saint in Washington, DC.
